author: IGN
description: Years into their relationship, Tim and Millie (Dave Franco and Alison Brie) find themselves at a crossroads as they move to the country, abandoning all that is familiar in their lives except each other. With tensions already flaring a nightmarish encounter with a mysterious, unnatural force threatens to corrupt their lives, their love, and their flesh.
title: Together - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Alison Brie, Dave Franco

author: IGN
description:
The Future Games Show Spring Showcase is here! The livestream will start at 1pm PDT | 4pm EDT | 8pm GMT and will have reveals, exclusive demos, dev interviews, world premieres, trailers, and more featuring over 40 different games, from AAA studios to indie games. Tune in for the fun!

#IGN #Gaming
title: Future Games Show: Spring Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the new Autopsy Simulator trailer for the reveal this simulation game is coming to Xbox Series X|S and PS5 (PlayStation 5) on April 3, 2025. It is already available on PC via Steam.

Autopsy Simulator will see players study realistic case files, created in collaboration with real-world forensic practitioners, to help guide their examinations and dissections. Utilizing medically authentic tools and procedures, players will learn all they can about the deceased before solving the mystery of their case.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Autopsy Simulator - Official Console Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
There have been more than a dozen entries in the Assassin's Creed series. So it’s easy to see how the franchise has evolved over the years. Each new entry has introduced new mechanics, complete overhauls, and new modern twists, so with the release of Assassin’s Creed Shadows, it’s time to look at the biggest changes and additions Shadows has made to the AC formula.

00:00 Intro
00:23 Dual Protagonists
01:19 New Stealth Options
02:26 Grab & Non-Lethal Takedowns
02:53 Immersive Mode
03:16 The Four Seasons
03:50 No More Follow Road
04:15 No Eagle Companions
04:57 Stricter Climbing
05:31 Grappling Hook Traversal
05:57 Destructible Cover
06:29 Summonable Allies
06:51 The Hideout

#IGN #Gaming #AssassinsCreedShadows
title: Assassin’s Creed Shadows: 12 Biggest Changes and Additions

author: IGN
description:
Gachiakuta is coming to Crunchyroll this July! Crawl back from the abyss of Hell to change this lousy world!

Rudo lives in the slums of a floating town, where the poor scrape by under the shadow of the rich who live a sumptuous life, simply casting their garbage off the side, into the abyss. Then one day, he’s falsely accused of murder, and his wrongful conviction leads to an unimaginable punishment—exile off the edge, with the rest of the trash. Down on the surface, the cast-off waste of humanity has bred vicious monsters, and if Rudo wants to have any hope of discovering the truth and seeking vengeance against those who cast him into Hell, he will have to master a new power and join a group known as the Cleaners who battle the hulking trash beasts of the Pit!
title: Gachiakuta - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Assassin's Creed Shadows has a beautiful map, so why not run across the entire thing during the fall? Gamepkay captured on an Xbox Series X using performance mode.

#IGN #Gaming #AssassinsCreedShadows
title: Running Across Assassin's Creed Shadows' Entire Map

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Skate Story console announcement trailer for the stylized action skateboarding game developed by Sam Eng. Players will embody a demon within the confides of the Underworld made from pain and glass. After the Devil grants the player a skateboard, they are tasked with grinding, kickflipping, and skating to swallow the Moon in exchange for freedom. Master the weight and feel of skating all while discovering the Devil's weaknesses to reach the end. Skate Story is coming to PlayStation 5 (PS5) in 2025.

#SkateStory #Gaming #Games
title: Skate Story - Official Console Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Next time you want to cross the coldest bounty hunter in the business, think again. Meet the new Hero, Freja, in this latest Overwatch 2 trailer to learn more about the character and see what happens when Freja’s latest job with Maximilien doesn’t go according to plan. You can play as Freja for a limited time from March 21 to March 24 before she officially arrives in Overwatch 2 in Season 16.
title: Overwatch 2 - Official Freja Hero Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Forever Skies release date trailer for the sci-fi action co-op game developed by Far From Home. Players must gather resources and explore a version of Earth that's been ravaged by an ecological disaster through a high-tech airship. Expand the airship to your liking, dispatch enemies on the toxic surface of Earth, and lead expeditions into abandoned facilities and greenhouses to live another day. Forever Skies is launching on April 14 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam).

#Gaming #ForeverSkies #Games
title: Forever Skies - Official Release Date and Preorder Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch Disney and Pixar's Elio trailer for this upcoming animated film featuring the voice talents of Yonas Kibreab as Elio, Zoe Saldaña as Aunt Olga, Remy Edgerly as Glordon, Brad Garrett as Lord Grigon, Jameela Jamil as Ambassador Questa and Shirley Henderson as OOOOO. Disney and Pixar’s Elio opens in theaters on June 20, 2025.

This summer, moviegoers will meet Elio (voiced by Yonas Kibreab), an 11-year-old whose biggest wish is to get abducted by aliens.

For centuries, people have called out to the universe looking for answers—in Disney and Pixar’s all-new feature film Elio, the universe calls back! The cosmic misadventure introduces Elio, a space fanatic with an active imagination and a huge alien obsession. So, when he’s beamed up to the Communiverse, an interplanetary organization with representatives from galaxies far and wide, Elio’s all in for the epic undertaking. Mistakenly identified as Earth’s leader, Elio must form new bonds with eccentric alien lifeforms, navigate a c
title: Elio - Official Trailer (2025) Zoe Saldaña, Yonas Kibreab

author: IGN
description:
Watch a sword expert react to Assassin's Creed Shadows! How realistic is Ubisoft's latest open-world action RPG? We got weapons expert Matt Easton to watch some Assassin's Creed Shadows gameplay featuring shinobi, Naoe, and samurai, Yasuke, along with their AC Shadows weapons and AC Shadows combat styles. How realistic is a serrated katana? Does a poisonous naginata make sense? Matt shares his expertise on Japanese warfare and Kenjutsu to find out just how realistic the Assassin's Creed Shadows combat really is.

Matt Easton is a Historical European Martial Artist (HEMA), Antique Arms Dealer, and owner of the fencing club Schola Gladiatoria.

00:00 - Intro
00:26 - AC Shadows Yasuke
01:15 - Yasuke Stand-off
04:44 - AC Shadows Yasuke Combat
06:23 - Poisoned Naginata
09:34 - AC Shadows Naoe Bokken Training
10:32 - Swords On Back
11:07 - Serrated Katana
12:08 - Final Thoughts

#AssassinsCreed #AssassinsCreedShadows #Gaming
title: Sword Expert Reacts To Assassin's Creed Shadows Weapons and Combat

author: IGN
description:
Check out the new Ballerina trailer for the upcoming film starring Ana de Armas, Anjelica Huston, Gabriel Byrne, Lance Reddick, Catalina Sandino Moreno, Norman Reedus, with Ian McShane, and Keanu Reeves. Ballerina is set in the world of John Wick.

Taking place during the events of John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum, Ballerina follows Eve Macarro (Ana de Armas) who is beginning her training in the assassin traditions of the Ruska Roma.

Ballerina opens in theaters on June 6, 2025.

#JohnWick #Ballerina #Movies
title: Ballerina - Official Trailer #2 (2025) Ana de Armas, Keanu Reeves, Norman Reedus

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at the latest gameplay trailer for Honor of Kings: World, the beautiful new open-world co-op fantasy-action-RPG from Timi Studio of Tencent that's in development for PC and mobile platforms.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Honor of Kings: World – Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Assassin's Creed is back once again, this time set in the historically rich landscape of Feudal Japan. A lot has changed this time around for the storied series, so even if you're an Assassin's Creed vet, here are some suggestions of things to do first to get you started on your adventure on the right foot.
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows - 10 Things to Do First

author: IGN
description:
Having appeared in The Boys, Star Trek: Lower Decks, Scream, and The Hunger Games, Jack Quaid is more than ready for his action hero moment, and he gets it in Novocaine. Quaid sits down with IGN's Tom Jorgensen to talk about his new movie and play three of his favorite games: Left 4 Dead 2, Middle-Earth: Shadow of Mordor (in which he appears as Dirhael), and Super Smash Bros. Melee. As a dyed-in-the-wool nerd, Quaid has strong opinions on how Netflix should be handling their upcoming BioShock adaptation, why Melee is better than Ultimate, and how RedLetterMedia's Star Wars prequel reviews changed the internet forever.

Novocaine is in theaters now.
title: Jack Quaid Plays Super Smash Bros. Melee & Remembers Almost Killing Troy Baker | IGN Arcade

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Just the Beginning Trailer for Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl, a first-person action survival shooter developed by GSC Game World. Players will enter The Zone in their own unique way to discover the secrets that lie among the waste, survive against enemies, and chase whatever they're after at all costs. Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl is available now for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GoG).

#Stalker2HeartOfChornobyl #Gaming #IGN
title: Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl - Official Just the Beginning Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Palworld trailer, announcing that the Palworld crossplay update is now available across all platforms. This update arrives alongside some new features including Photo Mode, a Drafting Table, and the Global Palbox which lets players store Pal data and transfer Pals between worlds. Players can now also equip armour cosmetically using the Antique Dresser and change their character’s appearance without affecting armor stats.

#Palworld #Gaming #Games
title: Palworld - Official Crossplay Update Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the latest World of Tanks trailer to see what to expect with the new Battle Pass Special: Peaky Blinders, which brings a limited-time-in-game event based on the television series. The new Battle Pass Special brings Peaky Blinders-themed rewards, featuring protagonist Tommy Shelby at the helm. Players will be able to commend and recruit five of the most formidable figures from the drama series, including Tommy Shelby, his brother Arthur, and John Shelby. A special bundle introduces Ada Shelby and Michael Gray. The event's ultimate reward is the Tier IX Premium French Medium tank - Char Murat. World of Tanks' Battle Pass Special: Peaky Blinders in-game event launches on March 20 and runs until March 31, 2025.
title: World of Tanks - Official Peaky Blinders Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the Bundles Trailer for The Boys collaboration in Rainbow Six Siege, the hit first-person tactical shooter developed by Ubisoft. Homelander and Black Noir make their way to Rainbow Six Siege as Ace and Demios respectively to take on a rogue faction in this all-new crossover event. The Homelander and Black Noir Bundles are available now for Rainbow Six Siege.
title: Rainbow Six Siege x The Boys - Official Homelander and Black Noir Trailer
